visual_events.description: Two men are standing in a dry grassy field, talking, with other vehicles and people visible in the distance under a bright sunny sky.
A man in a black uniform with 'Trauma Flight' on his cap and blue gloves is pointing towards the blue and white helicopter behind him.
The man in the 'Trauma Flight' uniform points at several medical bags laid out on the ground near the helicopter's tail rotor.
A stretcher is placed on the ground next to the helicopter, ready for a patient.
Another man in a black uniform walks towards the helicopter, carrying medical bags.
A wide shot shows the white and blue 'Custom Trauma Flight' helicopter parked in the field, with people and vehicles in the background.
A man in a flight suit stands next to the helicopter's nose, looking at the camera, while other personnel are in the distance.
An ambulance drives into view in the distance, heading towards the helicopter.
The ambulance is seen backing up towards the helicopter, its rear displaying 'Ambulance Manitoba'.
The side door of the ambulance is open, revealing two paramedics and a patient on a stretcher inside the vehicle.
A female paramedic in a mask and high-visibility vest is attending to the patient inside the ambulance, holding an IV bag.
A male medical professional in a black uniform joins the female paramedic inside the ambulance, assessing the patient and medical equipment.
The paramedics are seen exiting the ambulance, while the 'Trauma Flight' helicopter remains visible in the background.
Several medical personnel are gathered in the field, near the ambulance and helicopter.
A mannequin, dressed in a red vest and plaid pants, is lying on the ground, representing a patient, near a black pickup truck.
Medical personnel gather around the mannequin and various medical bags and equipment on the ground.
A man begins performing chest compressions on the mannequin, simulating CPR.
A male medical professional prepares a bag-valve mask (BVM) and other equipment while CPR is ongoing.
Another medical professional carries a Lucas device (mechanical CPR device) towards the mannequin.
The medical team is actively engaged in the simulated resuscitation, with multiple members tending to the mannequin and equipment.
A female paramedic is seen preparing an IV line and medication.
The team continues to perform CPR and manage the resuscitation, discussing defibrillation and medication administration.
The Lucas device is being positioned and set up over the mannequin for automated chest compressions.
The medical team is focused on the mannequin, with various roles being performed including CPR, medication preparation, and equipment management.
The scene shows the intensive efforts of the medical team in the simulated emergency, working around the mannequin.
The Lucas device is actively engaged, performing automated chest compressions on the mannequin.
